props.code:
+ Laravel for the api.
+ Laravel websockets package for the websoket server.
+ Laravel Spatie package for role and permission managements.
+ Redis for messages event queue.
+ Docker for managing the containers.
+ Nginx as a web server.

+ Laravel for the api.
